frontMatter.title: wrk: Modern HTTP benchmarking tool
frontMatter.summary: wrk - a HTTP benchmarking tool wrk is a modern HTTP benchmarking tool capable of generating significant load when run on a single multi-core CPU. It combines a multithreaded design with scalable event...
